basic.floral_language:
Crassula fusca
Floriography: enthusiastic, vigorous, vigorous
Is a succulent, with clustered green leaves and side branches, leaves are long and rigid, with tips, in a cool season with abundant sunlight, leaves turn purple red, like flames. 
Likes abundant sunlight, tolerates to half shade, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, shade properly in a cool environment. Flowers are white.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny turning to fuchsia

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer high temperature
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
